message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to go down to $110, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
